1: <pb/>Alc'ualaxelab, rumal rech chi ix cojoninak che ri Ajawaxel, chebinimaj ri i tat i nan. Are c'u wa' ri suc'.
2: <pb/><f>[10]</f>Are wa' nabe takomal ri rachilam jun chi'nic: “Nim chawila' wi ri a tat xukuje' ri a nan,
3: <pb/>rech utz catelic, naj c'ut catc'asi' na cho ri uwächulew.”
4: <pb/>Ri ix c'ut tataxelab, miyac coyowal ri e iwalc'ual, xane' chebiq'uiyisaj ruc' pixbenic, chebitijoj che ri u tzij ri Ajawaxel.
5: <pb/>Ri ix lok'om pataninelab, chebinimaj ri e iwajaw waral cho ri uwächulew. Nim chebiwila' wi, china' iwib chquiwäch, chebinimaj ruc' ronojel iwanima', je ta ne are ri Crist quipatanij.
6: <pb/>Chixpataninok, man xuwi ta aretak cätajin quixcalawächij rech utz quixil wi. Xane' jacha' chixpataninok chi ix u pataninelab ri Crist, ruc' ronojel iwanima' chibana' jas ri cäraj ri Dios.
7: <pb/>Chixpataninok ruc' ronojel iwanima', je ta ne are quipatanij ri Ajawaxel, man are ta ri winak.
8: <pb/>Iweta'm c'ut we ix lok'om pataninelab, o man ix lok'om pataninelab taj, ri utzil ri quiban chi jujunal qui c'amowaj na che ri Ajawaxel Dios.
9: <pb/>Xukuje' ri ix ajawib, xa' junam chibana' chque ri e i pataninelab. Chiya' can ri u cojic qui xibriquil. Iweta'm chi ri ix cuc' ri e are', xa' junam ix c'o pa u k'ab ri Iwajaw ri c'o chicaj. Ri are' man are ta cäril qui wäch ri winak we nim o man nim ta qui banic.
10: <pb/>Are c'u ri camic, wachalal tak, chicowirisaj iwib pa ri Ajawaxel Jesus, xukuje' pa ri u cuinem ri u chuk'ab.
11: <pb/>Chito' iwib ruc' conojel ri ch'ojibal ri cuya' ri Dios chiwe. Jeri' quixcuinic co quixtaq'ui' chuwäch ri itzel, ri cäraj quixusubu ruc' ri itzel tak u no'j.
12: <pb/>Man cujch'ojin ta cuc' winak, xane' cuc' itzel tak uxlabal ri e c'o pa ri caj, ri c'o qui takanic xukuje' qui cuinem puwi' we uwächulew ri' re ri k'eku'm, xukuje' quetakan puwi'.
13: <pb/><f>[11]</f>Rumal c'u ri' chebic'ama' conojel ri chacubal re ch'o'j ri cuya' ri Dios, rech quixcuin che u to'ic iwib pa ri itzel k'ij. Aretak c'ut coc'ow ronojel, co quixtaq'ui' canok.
14: <pb/><f>[12]</f>Co ba' chixtac'alok. Chicojo' ri kastzij, je jas jun pas ximibal re ri u xe' i pam. Chicojo' ri suq'uil, je jas jun ajch'o'j cucoj ch'ich' cho uwo u c'u'x che u to'ic rib.
15: <pb/>Chisuc'umaj iwib che u tzijoxic ri jamaril, jas jun ajch'o'j cucoj ri u xajäb.
16: <pb/>Paquiwi' c'u conojel, ri i cojonic are chicojo' che i quetequic ch'ich' ri quebelpoc'naj wi conojel tak ri e u ch'ab ri itzel ri quenicowic.
17: <pb/>Chicojo' ri colobal iwib je jas jun ajch'o'j cucoj to'bal u jolom. Chic'ama' ri u ch'ich' re ch'o'j ri Uxlabaxel, are wa' ri u tzij ri Dios.
18: <pb/>Mitanaba' ri u banic ch'awem ruc' Dios: chixbochi'nok xukuje' chixtz'onom che ri Dios amak'el, pa ri Uxlabaxel. Chixc'asc'atok, mixtuktubic, chibana' c'u ch'awem puwi' ronojel ri u tinimit ri Dios.
19: <pb/>Xukuje' chibana' ch'awem panuwi' in, rech aretak quinch'awic, ri Dios cuya' ri tzij chwe, rech man quinxe'j ta wib aretak quintzijoj ri tzij re colobal ib ri man etamatal ta can nabe.
20: <pb/>Ri Dios in u takom che u tzijoxic we utzalaj tzij ri'. Rumal c'u wa' in c'o pa che'. Chibana' ch'awem panuwi' rech man quinxe'j ta wib, quintzijoj jas ri takal u banic wumal.
21: <pb/>Ri Tiquico cubij na ronojel chiwe jas ri nu banom xukuje' jas ri cätajin quinbano rech quiwetamaj. Ri Tiquico are' lok'alaj kachalal xukuje' jicalaj pataninel pa ri u chac ri Ajawaxel.
22: <pb/>Rumal c'u ri' xintak bic iwuc' rech quiwetamaj jas ri ka banom, rech cucu'bisaj na i c'u'x.
23: <pb/>Are' ri Dios ri Tataxel, xukuje' ri Ajawaxel Jesucrist, chuya' chque ri achalaxelab jamaril xukuje' lok'ok'ebal c'uxaj, rachilam cojonic.
24: <pb/>Tok'ob chque conojel ri quelok'ok'en ri Kajaw Jesucrist, ruc' jun lok'ok'ebal c'u'x ri man cajalc'at taj.
